item.title: Allen add a quote by Milton Friedman
item.description: "Even the most ardent environmentalist doesn't really want to stop pollution. If he thinks about it, and doesn't just talk about it, he wants to have the <i> right amount </i> of pollution. We can't really <i> afford </i> to eliminate it - not without abandoning all the benefits of technology that we not only enjoy but on which we depend." -- Milton Friedman

item.title: Allen add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Allen add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "Belief isn't simply a thing for fair times and bright days...What is belief - what is faith - if you don't continue in it after failure?...Anyone can believe in someone, or something that always succeeds...But failure...ah, now, that is hard to believe in, certainly and truly. Difficult enough to have value. Sometimes we just have to wait long enough...then we find out why exactly it was that we kept believing...There's always another secret." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Allen add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "It's easy to believe in something when you win all the time...The losses are what define a man's faith." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Allen add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "One cannot seperate truth from actions...Physically inevitable or not, truth stands above all things. It is independant of who has the best army, who can deliver the longest sermons, or even who has the most priests. It can be pushed down, but it will always surface. Truth is the one thing you can never intimidate." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Allen add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "If you're always on time, it implies that you never have anything better you should be doing. -Kelsier" -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Allen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Experience is merely the name men gave to their mistakes." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Allen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Words! Mere words! How terrible they were! How clear, and vivid, and cruel! One could not escape from them. And yet what a subtle magic there was in them! They seemed to be able to give a plastic form to formless things, and to have a music of their own as sweet as that of viol or of lute. Mere words! Was there anything so real as words?" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Allen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Allen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Other people are quite dreadful. The only possible society is oneself." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Allen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It takes great deal of courage to see the world in all its tainted glory, and still to love it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Allen add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Allen add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling
